reviews.comments: Bien sin problemas!!
Es un buen lugar. Buena gente. Creo que puede ser mejor aún, todo tiene solución.
reviews.response: Estimada Marcela, no mi intención polemizar por aca. Vos violaste una de las reglas de la casa, que es no ingresar con personas que no estén alojadas. Que DESPUES de haber ingresado me hayas llamado no cambia nada. Se trata de una regla explicita que vos decidiste quebrar y además de falta de sentido común. No hubo ningun problema en tu estadia excepto eso.

reviews.comments:
Muy buena opción. El baño privado en la habitación es algo que no se consigue normalmente. Roman y Carla son muy atentos, amables y accesibles.
La única contra es que no se puede cocinar en el departamento (tal como lo indican en el anuncio), pero es super entendible ya que la cocina está en el mismo ambiente donde ellos trabajan.
Muy recomendado!
Me sentí muy cómoda. Pude descansar sin inconvenientes. Fueron muy amables. El lugar tranquilo y el barrio también.
Roman y carla son la descripción perfecto de un excelente anfitrión. Siempre están atentos a tus necesidades y preguntas. La casa y la habitación son excelentes. Recomendado 100%.
El lugar estuvo perfecto para llegar a la universidad donde se desarrolló el congreso al que asistí. Me encantó el cuarto y que tenga baño privado. Roman y Carla muy amables!

Una excelente opción para tu paso por Buenos Aires. El lugar es cercano a estaciones de colectivo y subte, restaurantes y calles lindas para caminar. La habitación es muy cómoda, limpia y agradable. Roman y Carla son excelentes anfitriones, siempre prestos a orientarte y a compartir sus experiencias. Totalmente recomendado.
La ubicación es buena, el lugar es moderno y bien conservado. Román y Carla son muy amables. Considero que es una buena opción para estar en Buenos Aires.

Excelente !  ... Buena ubicación , lindo lugar , agradables sitios cercanos para comer y sobre todo extraordinarios anfitriones !!! 
Súper recomendado !

Roman y Carla son una joven pareja interesante y muy simpatica. La vivienda está ubicada en un tranquilo y bonito barrio cerca de Belgrano ideal si quieres conocer como viven los argentinos de clase media pero sin embargo bien conectado con el centro de la ciudad (subterráneo B a unas cuadras) Una habitación con baño privada, cómoda y luminosa. 
Buena gente, lugar tranquilo, seguro y conectado.
reviews.response: Gracias Christian, estas en el top 5 de los mejores huespedes ! :-)

reviews.comments: Si bien no es una zona céntrica, el barrio es muy tranquilo y bonito, hay un subte a pocas cuadras y en la esquina pasan algunos buses. La habitación cómoda y la gata es encantadora. Los chicos, Carla y Roman muy amables y considerados en cuanto a no causar ruido. Estuve muy tranquila y cómoda
Muchas gracias Roman por la estadia en su casa, recomendo a todos los amigos.
Excelente estadía, se preocupa por sus huéspedes, sitio impecable, una gran atención, recomendado 100%

Muy linda la casa y el cuarto y son exactamente como en las fotos.
El barrio tranquilo y bien conectado.
Roman su novia y el gato Pizzu me acogieron muy bien :)
Great place great people!
It’s a very nice and clean room. Román was very helpful and communicative. I would definitely stay here again!

Fui muito bem recebido na casa de Carla e Roman! A hospedagem superou as minhas expectativas! quero agradecer à atenção que Carla me prestou me orientando em varias questões sobre a cidade bem como a preocupação do casal para comigo quando senti a garganta e tive um importante apoio que fez com que me sentisse acolhido e bem melhor! Obrigado Carla e Roman! Um abraço!

Roman e Carla são super atensiosos. Desde a chegada me deram bastante ajuda e dicas. A suite é muito confortável e com total privacidade. A casa fica a umas quadras do metrô o que facilita muito o deslocamento para os lugares turísticos. Tem bons restaurantes ao redor.

Carol e Roman são excelentes anfitriões!

Passei excelentes dias na Argentina e muito por causa da minha escolha no AirBnb. A casa tem ótima localização, pertinho do metrô, e em vinte minutos eu estava em quaisquer ponto turístico de Buenos Aires. Carol e Roman são ótimos e estão sempre dispostos a ajudar quando solicitados. Aliás, o AirBnb deveria contrata Carol pra fazer consultoria sobre como ser uma ótima anfitriã e facilitar a vida dos hóspedes, pois as dicas/ajudas que ela deu agilizou e muito a minha viagem! Valeu!

A casa de Roman é muito charmosa, bem particular, mas algo que dá uma familiaridade e faz dela ser bem agradável. O quarto com suíte é muito bom, porque é simples, mas incrivelmente confortável. Para quem procura algum lugar que não seja tão central na cidade, e com  um preço muito sensato, creio que a casa de Roman seja uma escolha excelente. A casa é silenciosa, muito boa para descansar, para quem tem o dia cheio.  Quanto à localização, embora não seja em uma região central, há acesso fácil para todos os lugares - sejam coletivos (ônibus) e trens. Além disso, eles são super atenciosos e explicam muito bem como proceder na cidade, seja para passageiros de primeira viagem, seja para veteranos. Muito recomendado!

Roman e Carol super atenciosos e local bem confortável para eu que estava viajando de mochileiro e me ajudaram no deslocamento para ir a pé e de metro. Pois tem opções próximas. Casa tranquila e sem agitação, bairro lindo e calmo!

Roman e sua esposa super prestativo. Não conseguimos conversar muito. Mas voltarei a Buenos Aires e quero ficar de novo com eles. O apartamento é lindo, limpo e bem localizado. Muito fácil pegar o metrô. Sua esposa fala muito bem português, me ajudou muito. Gracias amigos!
Modern appartment in a quiet area. Easy access to any place with subway.

Roman's place was wonderful for me. The price was just right, both he and Carla were extremely helpful and friendly and I was able to do all I needed to. I loved having my own bathroom too.  Great experience!
Resumo a minha hospedagem em uma só palavra "Perfeito"

The room was exactly what I expected. The bathroom is pretty well equiped and clean. 
Román y Carolina welcomed me and gave me a key of the house. You have total freedom to enter and exit any time you want. Also, they give tips to use public transportation and how to move around the city. They have maps and info about tours and POI.
The neighborhood is really quite and safe to walk (even late at night).
Indico o espaço de Roman acolhedor e muito disponível a ajudar com informações e dicas sobre a cidade

Roman was very helpful. The apartment is beautiful and located in a peaceful residential area? It was also really quiet. Perhaps even a bit too quiet as, I felt that it was difficult to get some privacy.
reviews.response: Not sure what you ment... if there was something making you uncomfortable I was hoping you would let me know... Thanks for the feedback anyway, Steven.

reviews.comments: The Apartment of Roman is very nice. I enjoyed the tranqility and the patio. It is close by to a Metrostation and it is a good place for relaxion after you are in the center.
Roman is a musician, someone very sensitive to noise. The room proposed is very close to his room. So be aware of this! Phone calls only in the living room for example.
reviews.response:
Dear Isabel :
You informed me twice wrongly your arrival time. I spent one day waiting for you. You got home past midnight way off the check-in time and still I received you in a friendly and welcoming way. The next day at 7 am you begun a phone call in a very loud tone of voice clearly violating my house rules which I asked you to read and were pinned next to your bed in English and Spanish. I made an exception and did not tell you anything. The next day, Saturday at 7 am, again. Another phone call so loud it wake US up. I am not sensitive to noise. I am sensitive to rudeness.

reviews.comments: Romans place was nice and cozy in a quiet neighborhood. The subway is just a few blocks away and takes you to the city center in less than 30mins.
reviews.response: Andreas is a very nice and respecful guy!! very recommended

reviews.comments: This area is quite nice and the apartment is beautifully designed around a nice courtyard. It's green and quiet. The cat is very friendly and nice - I enjoyed playing with him. Public transport and supermarkets are close and I used to walk to and from Palermo every day. A great value.
I had a nice stay, it's a really clean and adorable house.

Really safe and pretty neighbourhood, and very quiet and peaceful inside the house. Perfect if you're a solo traveller and/or need peace and quiet to study. There's a place on the neighbouring street which sells delicious and v reasonably priced pre-prepared meals - ask Roman where it is! Many thanks for having me to stay, Lucy.

Roman's place is in a nice quiet neighbourhood and is a nice change of pace after the fast pace of central Buenos Aires. He is very welcoming and even came to pick me up when I ended up at the wrong address! Thanks again for letting me stay at your place Roman!
Very clean, bright apartment. Nice facilities and a perfect break from the chaos in San Telmo, you will not be disappointed with the laid back location or friendly, helpful hosts.

Casa muito bonita e o quarto muito confortável. Em boa localização, e muito seguro o bairro. Roman e sua esposa são muito prestativos, passam muitas informações e algumas dicas de como é estar e circular na cidade. Muito bom!

The home is in a safe and convenient neighborhood. There are tons of choices of great places to eat - one is right across the street. Roman and Carla are friendly and nice and it was great to have a cat to hang out with too. It was walking distance to the subway. The room had a private bathroom and a desk.
Roman is great host, and very flexible.  he Will make sure you have all the information you need for a nice stay.

Muito bom! Adorei a estadia e tudo ocorreu conforme o previsto. O Roman é muito boa gente e fala português. A casa é bastante próxima do Metrô (estação Tronador) e vocÊ consegue chegar rapidamente ao Centro. A suíte é maravilhosa (ótima cama, ótimo banheiro, aquecimento, tudo do bom e do melhor). Recomendo 100%!!

Very nice and safe residential neighbourhood. Ten minutes walk to the tube station, and plenty of buses running in the area. Roman's flat is super quiet. The bedroom is pretty convenient, the bed comfortable, and the en-suite bathroom a plus. Roman is always in contact and available to sort out any issues that could arise. I definitely recommend it.

Esta é a minha segunda experiência com Roman e não poderia ser tão boa como a primeira. Sempre solícito, disponível para qualquer questionamento e simpático. Sua vizinhança é ótima, casa próxima de vários locais de interesse e de fácil acesso e deslocamento pelos principais meios de transporte! O quarto é ótimo, e estava tudo tão bom quanto da primeira vez que me hospedei com eles. Já disse que voltando pra uma terceira vez a Buenos Aires com certeza ficarei em sua casa! Recomendadíssimo! Ele e sua namorada, Carla, são pessoas maravilhosas.

This is my second time at Roman's room and it couldn't be better as the first time! He is always available and kind to help you in any question you may have. His neighborhood is nice, close to everything, you can go everywhere in minutes by any means! His room is great and it was as good as the last time I was there.  I've already told him that if I come back to Buenos Aires for a third time, I will stay at his room again! Highly recommended! He and his girlfriend Carla are wonderful people!

Roman foi bem receptivo, me auxiliou quando precisei. O quarto e o banheiro estavam limpinhos quando cheguei.
Obrigada! 
Abraços, Giselda.

Avery good stay!! 
Very much recommendable!!

Roman and Carla are fantastic hosts! They help you out with whatever you may need, providing useful information, card for the metro, coffee, food in case you run out... be their guest! The house is beautiful, as you see it in the pictures, in a nice&quiet neighbourhood. The only downfall is that it's in not in the center, but still, not very far either. The private bathroom is a great asset! I'm sure you'll enjoy a fantastic stay! Highly recommended!

Roman and Carla and the cat were welcoming hosts. Their house is nice and clean and is located in a quiet and residential area. There is a metro around 6 blocks or so, it's within walking distance.
Roman was very helpful with tips and always quick with replies to messages. I would definitely recommend his place.
Roman as a easy going person offers me a nice and clean room in a quite neighborhood. He helped me a lot for my first we in buenos aires, i really enjoyed it!

Beautiful place in a safe neighborhood and very close to many restaurants, shopping, and nice elegant homes. I felt welcomed and very grateful that Roman waited for me due to my late night flight in. Thank you so much for showing me around! That alone was priceless.
It was really a fantastic period. I felt at home when I had breakfast or shared a nice person dinner at the evening. I want to thank for helping

부에노스 아이레스에서 1주일간 로만네 집에서 머물렀습니다. 집이 참 깨끗하고요, 주인 커플도 무척 친절합니다. 심지어 고양이까지 무척 착하더군요. 전철역에서 멀지 않기에 시내 관광 다니기도 좋습니다. 무엇보다 작은 가정집인데 가운데 아담한 마당 느낌의 정원이 있어 방에서 보이는 뷰가 예쁩니다.

강력하게 추천합니다!

Roman and Carla were great host, very kind and respectful.I was only 2 night but I felt very welcome. The house and the bedroom is very nice and confortable. It is also very clean. The neighborhood is quite and charming. I highly recommend to be in here !
Thanks a lot Roman and Carla !!!!
Felt great!
reviews.response: Thaks a lot, Michelle. It was nice to meet you, guys.

reviews.comments:
To put it simply, this is a great place and Roman is a great host.  First off, Roman and his girlfriend were very welcoming.  They are very helpful and generous.  Also if you are not the best with the Spanish language, Roman is very fluent in English.  His girlfriend speaks well too and is getting better every day!  Keep going to your classes Carla!  You will have your own private room and full bathroom so if you like privacy, the hosts are very respectful of that.  As far as location it is pretty far from the center of the city so if you like tranquil areas this is the place.  It seemed to me to be a family neighborhood.  Very safe.  But the subte is only five or six blocks away and it´s the B line so it´s real easy to get to the city center and Puerto Madero.  This was my first time Airbnb experience and first time in Buenos Aires and I am glad I made Roman´s place my first choice!

Gracias Roman!
reviews.response: Hey Joey thanks for the good review and nice words. We  wish you a great trip and hope to see you again in my next show ;-)

reviews.comments: Roman was an excellent host.  He helped me out with the neighborhood; where to buy food, how to deal with transport etc.  I would not hesitate to stay with Roman and Carla again.  Descriptions were accurate, the place was clean, it's a nice little room with the private bath, perfect for my needs.  The neighbor is nice, accessible to buses and subway (subte) lines. thank you Roman and Carla!!!!
Nice place.  Good stay.
reviews.response: thnx, Verlyn... I'm glad you've enjoyed it.

reviews.comments: Lovely little flat and the bed's really comfy. Fantastic bathroom. Roman and Carla couldn't have been more warm and attentive. Thanks a lot, guys.

A Carla e o Roman foram ótimos anfitriões, super legais e me ajudaram em tudo o que eu precisava. Além disso, foram bem acolhedores, e quando cheguei o quarto estava prontinho pra mim com dois mapas (um deles me salvou em vários momentos sem internet) e com um cartão SUBE, que eu ia comprar e nem precisei. Os dois são maravilhosos juntos, Roman sempre me perguntava do meu dia e eu me senti bem acolhida na minha estadia em Buenos Aires - o que, claro, contribuiu pra que minha experiência na cidade fosse melhor ainda. E por fim, não poderia deixar de falar do Pitzu, o gatinho, que é um fofo e adora um carinho 3 Recomendo muito!
Roman made sure I was comfortable and oriented me to Buenos Aires. Thanks Roman and Carla for a great experience!
reviews.response: You are welcome Dustin. I hope you are enjoying BA!

reviews.comments: Roman's room is very good! The bed is comfortable, the decoration is nice and the bathroom is more than I imagined! His house is really cozy, warm for winter and he is always available to help you whenever you need! Even he doesn't live in "the most famous" neighbourhoods of Buenos Aires, his location is excellent! Nice neighbourhood, close to 2 subte stations, buses are available nearby, there is an avenue where you can find anything you need... I enjoyed a lot the location! Roman is a very nice guy, we had few but nice conversations! His girlfriend Carla is also an awesome person! They even shared some meals with me and it was really nice to talk with them about the city, culture, language and many other stuffs! Both were very attentive and helped me to enjoy Buenos Aires the most! I enjoyed a lot my stay in his room and when I'm back to BsAs, I will definitely be there again! Higly recommended!

Roman couldn't have been a more kind and helpful host. This being the first time that I've used Airbnb I wasn't quite sure what to expect but Roman and his girlfriend Carla made sure I felt right at home. Anytime I needed anything Roman and Carla were on hand to give me advice or help me out. I thoroughly enjoyed my entire experience and the next time I find myself in Buenos Aires I know exactly where I'm going to be staying. Muchas Gracias Roman!
Roman è gentilissimo e l appartamento è molto grazioso. Bagno indipendente. zona tranquilla vicino ai servizi principali.

Roman e Carla foram excelentes anfitriões nos ajudaram em tudo que precisavamos, nos levaram inclusive para conhecer o Parque de La Memoria. A casa é linda, limpa e superconfortável. A vizinhança é bem segura com boas opções de restaurantes. Ainda estamos com saudades do gatinho.

Highly recommended!
The best airbnb experience so far!
Cozy flat with a nice patio, comfortable bed,private bathroom. Really clean. The best was meeting Roman and his gf Carla,they made me feel home and helped me with everything, even brought me to visit town,they are really nice,new friends to me! The neighbourhood is green and quiet,well communicated with the centre by metro. Three blocks from a large avenue with bars restaurants,bank and pharmacy. Guys, thank you again, it was the best place to begin my adventure!

Eu amei ficar na casa do Roman, ele e a Carla foram extremamente gentis e prestativos, me deram super dicas de como aproveitar Buenos Aires. O bairro é muito acolhedor, as ruas largas e muito arborizadas, muito lindinho. Adorei a experiência!!!!

I spend two days at Romans place and I would most definitely recommend it! Roman and Carolina are very nice, welcoming and hospitable hosts and qill help you with everything you need tp get around in the city.  The house is as nice as it looks on the pictures and it is located in a beautiful neighborhood of Buenos Aires, which is calm and therefore an ideal place to relax. But if you want to jump in to the bustling city, it is not that far away, the subway is just a few blocks away and buses are nearby to get you to Palermo and Belgrano (and other places). Since both Roman and Carolina are very open minded, you can easily have a good conversation and a coffee with them. I am glad I stayed there and hope I see you again!
